summary.span: 用作自定义 ASP.NET Web 部件控件的基类，为 基类功能添加了一些附加用户界面 (UI) 属性、创建连接的能力和个性化行为。

span.span: Serves as the base class for custom ASP.NET Web Parts controls, adding to the base class features some additional user interface (UI) properties, the ability to create connections, and personalization behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建具有 Web 部件功能的控件时, 有两个基本选项。When you create controls with Web Parts functionality, you have two basic options. 您可以创建从类派生的自定义控件, 也可以创建或使用其他服务器控件。You can create custom controls that derive from the class, or you can create or use other server controls. 现有的 ASP.NET 控件、自定义服务器控件和用户控件均可通过在区域控件中声明它们 (或以编程方式将它们添加到) 来获得完全 Web 部件功能, 结果是将使用在运行时对象被视为真正的控件。Existing ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls can all be given full Web Parts functionality by declaring them within (or adding them programmatically to) a zone control, with the result that they will be wrapped with objects at run time and treated as true controls. 有关详细信息, 请参阅类的文档。For details, see the documentation for the class. 为了加快开发速度和最大程度地重复使用代码, 使用现有服务器控件可能是一个不错的选择。For speed of development and maximum reuse of code, using existing server controls can be a good option. 为了实现控件的行为和 Web 部件功能的最大编程控制, 创建从类继承的自定义控件通常是最佳选项。For maximum programmatic control over the behavior and Web Parts functionality of controls, creating a custom control that inherits from the class is often the best option. 抽象类从基控件继承, 并为所有控件提供基本元素。The abstract class inherits from the base control and provides the basic elements for all controls. 类包含一组影响 UI 外观的公共属性。The class includes a common set of properties that affect the appearance of the UI. 、 、 、、和属性分别指定是否允许Web应用程序的用户以给定属性指示的方式与部件控件交互 路径名.The , , , , , and properties each specify whether the user of a Web application is permitted to interact with the part control in the way indicated by the given property name. 、、 、、 、 、、 、、和属性确定大小, 可见性 、外观和控件的支持内容 (例如标题和说明)。The , , , , , , , , , , and properties determine the size, visibility, appearance, and supporting content (such as a title and a description) for a control. 控件在 Web 部件控件集内的上下文之间的关系由属性(如) 确定, 该属性包含对控件的关联对象的引用, 以及引用包含控件的。The relationship of a control to its context within the Web Parts control set is determined by properties such as , which holds a reference to the control's associated object, and , which references the that contains the control. 每页只能有一个控件, 控件的每个实例一次只能驻留在一个控件中。There can be only one control per page, and each instance of a control can reside within only one at a time. > [!NOTE] > 控件可以放置在某个区域的外部, 但在这种情况下, 它将作为常规的服务器控件, 几乎所有 Web 部件功能都不会丢失。A control can be placed outside of a zone on a Web page, but in this case it functions as a normal server control and loses nearly all Web Parts functionality. 其他几个重要属性会影响控件的独特功能。Several other important properties affect unique features of controls. 属性允许开发人员设置任意字符串, 该字符串可在运行时用作筛选器, 以确定控件是否已添加到页面中。The property allows developers to set an arbitrary string that can be used as a filter at run time to determine whether a control is added to the page. 此属性与功能 (如角色管理) 结合使用, 可提供一种基于定义的用户角色创建视图的有用机制。Used together with a feature such as role management, the property provides a useful mechanism for creating views based on defined user roles. 属性指示在导出过程中是导出控件上的所有可用属性数据, 还是仅导出非敏感数据。The property indicates whether, during an export, all the available property data on a control is exported, or only the non-sensitive data. 出于安全目的, 开发人员可以区分敏感数据和不是数据的数据。This allows developers to distinguish between data that is sensitive and data that is not, for security purposes. 属性返回 对控件实例的引用, 以便控件可以在页处于编辑模式时对其进行编辑。 The property returns a reference to an instance of a control, so that an control can edit it when the page is in edit mode. 最后, 有几个属性, 这些属性相对于页面的其余部分指示控件的状态。Finally, there are several properties that indicate the status of the control relative to the rest of the page. 属性指示控件是否已关闭 (因而添加到对象); 如果控件已打开且在该页上可用, 则为。 The property indicates whether a control is closed (and thus added to a object), or if it is open and available on the page. 属性指示控件是否为共享控件 (与用户特定的控件), 这意味着它对于网页的所有用户均可见。The property indicates whether a control is a shared control (versus a user-specific control), meaning that it is visible to all users of a Web page. 属性指示控件当前是否包含在派生的区域 (例如) 中。 The property indicates whether a control is currently contained in a -derived zone (such as ). 值`false`为指示控件在区域内, 因此具有完全 Web 部件功能。A value of `false` indicates the control is inside a zone and thus has full Web Parts functionality. 属性指示控件是静态的还是动态的。The property indicates whether a control is static or dynamic. 静态控件在网页的标记中声明, 而动态控件则以编程方式添加。A static control is declared in the markup of a Web page, whereas a dynamic control is added programmatically. 类还提供了若干方法来确定控件生命周期中不同点发生的情况。The class also provides several methods that determine what happens at various points in the control's life cycle. 例如, 和方法可在派生类中重写, 以便在与每个方法的名称相对应的事件期间, 提供对控件内容呈现的编程控制。For example, the and methods can both be overridden in a derived class to provide programmatic control over the rendering of a control's contents during the event that corresponds to each method's name. 从派生的类可以将对象添加到集合中。Classes that derive from can add objects to the collection. 谓词在控件标题栏中显示的谓词菜单中呈现。The verbs are rendered in a verbs menu, which appears in the title bar of a control. 对象为常见用户操作 (例如隐藏或最小化控件或显示帮助) 提供简单的 UI 元素。 objects provide simple UI elements for common user actions such as hiding or minimizing the control or displaying Help. 方法创建 与控件关联的任何自定义控件的集合。 The method creates a collection of any custom controls that are associated with a control. 开发人员可以重写此方法, 以便创建专门用于编辑控件的自定义控件。Developers can override this method so that it creates custom controls designed specifically to edit their control. 当用户单击控件上的编辑谓词时, 将调用方法。The method is called when a user clicks the edit verb on a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在网页中创建控件并对其进行引用。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and reference it in a Web page. 该示例的第一部分包含名 `TextDisplayWebPart`为的自定义控件的代码。The first part of the example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件演示如何创建一个简单的自定义控件, 该控件允许访问 Web 部件控件集的功能。This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您将源代码编译成一个程序集, 将其放在您的 web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹中, 并在您`Register`的网页中使用指令引用该程序集。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何在 ASP.NET 网页`TextDisplayWebPart`中引用该控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意, 可以通过声明方式向自定义控件分配许多不同的属性。Notice that many of the various properties can be assigned declaratively to the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textwebpartvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数为多个面向 UI 的属性初始化默认值, 包括确定`Allow`控件功能的各种属性。 The constructor initializes default values for several UI-oriented properties, including the various `Allow` properties that determine the control's capabilities. 然后, 这些属性将合并到继承的类实例中。These properties are then incorporated into an inherited class instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示从类派生的控件如何继承在基构造函数中设置的默认属性值, 但随后更改派生控件的构造函数中的一个属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how a control that derives from the class inherits the default property values set in the base constructor, but then changes the value of one property in the constructor of the derived control. 此示例的第一部分包含名为 `TextDisplayWebPart`的自定义控件的代码。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件演示如何创建一个简单的自定义控件, 该控件允许访问 Web 部件控件集的功能。This control demonstrates how to create a simple custom control that gives you access to the features of the Web Parts control set. 请注意, 在自定义控件的构造函数中`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` , 属性设置为`false`, 这会阻止用户关闭网页上的控件。Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您将源代码编译成一个程序集, 将其放在您的 web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹中, 并在您`Register`的网页中使用指令引用该程序集。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何在 ASP.NET 网页`TextDisplayWebPart`中引用该控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 在浏览器中加载页面后, 如果单击自定义控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单, 则关闭谓词现在处于禁用状态, 这会阻止用户关闭控件。After you load the page in a browser, if you click the verbs menu in the title bar of the custom control, the close verb is now disabled, which prevents users from closing the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textwebpartvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an end user can close a control on a Web page.

value.span: 如果可以在网页关闭该控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can be closed on a Web page; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户关闭网页上的控件后, 该控件将不再显示在该页上或不可用。After a user closes a control on a Web page, the control is no longer visible or available on the page. 将关闭的控件添加到页目录中, 这是一个存储对控件的引用的 Web 部件实体。The closed control is added to the page catalog, a Web Parts entity that stores a reference to the control. 如果开发人员将控件添加到控件中的页, 则用户可以将页切换到目录显示模式, 选择页目录中关闭的控件, 然后将其重新添加到页中。If a developer adds a control to the page within a control, users are able to switch the page to catalog display mode, select the closed control in the page catalog, and add it back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过编程方式将关闭的控件添加回页, 也可以由在页处于目录显示模式时从页目录中选择关闭的控件的用户重新添加。A closed control can be added back to a page either programmatically, or by a user who selects the closed control from the page catalog when the page is in catalog display mode. 关闭控件不同于删除控件。Closing a control is different from deleting it. 可以将关闭的控件添加回页, 同时删除已删除的控件。A closed control can be added back to a page, while a deleted control is permanently removed. 有关删除控件的详细信息, 请参阅方法。For more information on deleting controls, see the method. 关闭控件也不同于隐藏控件。Closing a control is also different from hiding it. 隐藏的控件仍然存在于页面上, 仍参与页面生命周期事件, 并且仅在用户的视图中隐藏, 但不会在页面上呈现关闭的控件。A control that is hidden is still present on the page, still participates in page life cycle events, and is only hidden from the user's view, but a closed control is not even rendered on a page. 静态控件和动态控件 (静态控件在页的标记中声明, 动态控件以编程方式添加) 可以关闭。Both static and dynamic controls (static controls are declared in a page's markup, while dynamic controls are added programmatically) can be closed. 如果开发人员将属性设置为`false`, 则不会在控件上出现 close 谓词, 并且用户无法关闭控件。If a developer sets the property to `false`, a close verb does not appear on the control, and the user is not able to close the control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为 , 并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改自定义 控件的属性的默认设置, 使其不能关闭。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom control, so that it cannot be closed. 此示例的第一部分包含名为 `TextDisplayWebPart`的自定义控件的代码。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 请注意, 在自定义控件的构造函数中`TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` , 属性设置为`false`, 这会阻止用户关闭网页上的控件。Note that in the constructor of the custom control, the `TextDisplayWebPart.AllowClose` property is set to `false`, which has the effect of preventing users from closing the control on a Web page. 这意味着将为用户禁用控件的谓词菜单上的关闭谓词。This means that the close verb on the verbs menu of the control will be disabled for users. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您将源代码编译成一个程序集, 将其放在您的 web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹中, 并在您`Register`的网页中使用指令引用该程序集。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_General_TextDisplayPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何在 ASP.NET 网页`TextDisplayWebPart`中引用该控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意, 在``引用该控件的元素中, 还可以更改由该控件的构造函数设置的属性的值。Note that in the `` element that references the control, you could also change the value of the property set by the control's constructor. 若要允许关闭控件, 只需在声明性`AllowClose="true"`标记中将属性添加到元素。To allow the control to be closed, simply add an `AllowClose="true"` attribute to the element in the declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要允许最终用户编辑控件 , 必须将属性设置为`true` (默认值), 并且页面的显示模式必须处于编辑模式。To allow end users to edit a control, the property must be set to `true` (the default), and the page's display mode must be in edit mode. 显示模式由控件中的字段表示。Display modes are represented by fields in the control. 在这种情况下, 模式为。In this case, the mode is . 有关页面显示模式以及如何更改它们的详细信息, 请参阅类概述。For details about page display modes and how to change them, see the class overview. 如果以声明方式或编程`false`方式将属性设置为,则编辑选项将受到限制。When the property is set to `false` either declaratively or programmatically, editing options are limited. 唯一可能的编辑操作是对页面布局的更改、使用控件或通过自定义控件启用的其他基本操作。The only possible editing operations are changes to the page's layout, using a control, or other basic operations enabled through custom controls. 有关使用 Web 部件控件集中的控件并演示如何启用自定义 Web 部件控件的示例, 请参阅[演练:创建 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770)。For an example that uses controls from the Web Parts control set and shows how to enable editing of a custom Web Parts control, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e05b659c-d6da-46cb-b177-48efe55f2770). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此属性对控件行为的影响也会受到网页的当前个性化设置范围的影响, 以及该页上单个 Web 部件控件。The effect that the property has on a control's behavior is also impacted by the current personalization scope of the Web page, and the individual Web Parts controls on that page. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为 , 并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改 Web 部件控件的属性的默认设置, 以便不能编辑控件。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be edited. 本示例假定使用控件, `TextDisplayWebPart`该控件位于类概述的 "示例" 部分。This example assumes the use of a control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件, 该控件使用户能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 通过在承载用户控件的网页顶部附近`Register`的指令引用用户控件。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在网页的声明性标记中, 在引用该``控件的元素上记下该`AllowEdit="false"`特性。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowEdit="false"` attribute. 尽管`true`是默认值, 但出于本示例的目的`false` , 属性已设置为。Although `true` is the default, the attribute has been set to `false` for the purposes of this example. 在浏览器中加载页面并使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将显示模式更改为 "编辑" 模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Modes** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode. 接下来, 单击控件标题栏中的谓词菜单, 并注意缺少编辑谓词, 因为在控件上禁用了编辑功能。Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the control, and note that the edit verb is missing, because you disabled editing on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/CS/alloweditCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowEdit/VB/alloweditVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users are allowed to hide a control.

value.span: 如果可以隐藏 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can be hidden; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定用户是否可以修改属性。 The property determines whether users can modify the property. 默认情况下, 当属性值为`true`时, 用户可以在编辑控件时更改值。In the default case, when the property value is `true`, users can change the value when the control is being edited. 默认情况下, 控件不会隐藏, 其属性值`false`为。By default, controls are not hidden and their property value is `false`. 在编辑 `true`控件时, 如果用户选中复选框以隐藏控件 (这会将属性设置为), 则当该页返回到浏览模式时, 控件将不再可见。 When a control is being edited, if a user selects a check box to hide the control (which sets the property to `true`), the control will no longer be visible when the page returns to browse mode. 隐藏控件与关闭的控件截然不同, 因为属性在 Web 部件控件集中具有不同的含义。Hidden controls are distinct from controls that are closed, because the property has a distinct meaning within the Web Parts control set. 关闭的控件甚至不会呈现在页上, 也不会参与页生命周期事件。Closed controls are not even rendered on a page, and do not participate in page life cycle events. 相反, 当隐藏控件对用户不可见时, 它们仍在网页上呈现, 仍包含在区域中, 并且仍可以与其他控件保持连接, 作为 Web 部件应用程序的一部分。In contrast, while hidden controls are not visible to users, they are still rendered on a Web page, are still contained in a zone, and can still maintain connections with other controls as part of a Web Parts application. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为 , 并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改自定义 Web 部件控件的属性的默认设置, 以使用户无法隐藏自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the custom control cannot be hidden by a user. 本示例假定使用自定义控件, `TextDisplayWebPart`该控件位于类概述的 "示例" 部分。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件, 该控件使用户能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 通过在承载用户控件的网页顶部附近`Register`的指令引用用户控件。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在网页的声明性标记中, 在引用控件``的元素上, `AllowHide="false"`记下属性, 这会阻止正在编辑控件的用户隐藏该控件。In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowHide="false"` attribute, which prevents a user who is editing the control from being able to hide it. 在浏览器中加载页面并使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将显示模式更改为 "编辑" 模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to edit mode. 接下来, 单击控件标题栏中的谓词菜单, 然后单击编辑谓词。Next, click the verbs menu in the title bar of the control and click the edit verb. 在显示编辑用户界面 (UI) 的情况下, 您可以看到编辑属性的 UI 现在处于禁用状态, 这是因为您将属性值设置为`false`。As the edit user interface (UI) is displayed, you can see that the UI to edit the property is now disabled, which occurred because you set the property value to `false`. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/CS/allowhidecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowHide/VB/allowhidevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最终用户是否可以最小化 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether end users can minimize a control.

value.span: 如果可以最小化 控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can be minimized; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`false`, 则会阻止最终用户最小化控件, 并且控件的标题栏中不显示控件的最小化用户界面 (UI)。The property, if set to `false`, prevents an end user from being able to minimize the control, and the user interface (UI) for minimizing the control does not appear in the control's title bar. 在 Web 部件术语中, 当属性设置为`false`时, 不会在控件的谓词菜单上显示最小化谓词。In Web Parts terminology, when the property is set to `false`, the minimize verb does not appear on the control's verbs menu. 当用户最小化控件时, 它会将控件的大小减小到仅显示控件标题栏和标题部分的最小区域。When a user minimizes a control, it reduces the control's size down to a minimal area that displays only part of the control's title bar and title. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为 , 并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改自定义 Web 部件控件的属性的默认设置, 以便用户无法将控件最小化。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that the control cannot be minimized by a user. 本示例假定使用自定义控件, `TextDisplayWebPart`该控件位于类概述的 "示例" 部分。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 在网页的声明性标记中, 在引用控件``的元素上, `AllowMinimize="false"`记下属性, 该特性隐藏控件的谓词菜单中的最小化谓词, 并防止用户能够最大程度地减少控件.In the declarative markup for the Web page, on the `` element that references the control, note the `AllowMinimize="false"` attribute, which hides the minimize verb in the control's verbs menu, and prevents a user from being able to minimize the control. 在浏览器中加载页面, 并单击控件上的谓词菜单。Load the page in a browser, and click the verbs menu on the control. 由于在该控件的声明性标记中禁用了 "最小化" 谓词, 该谓词通常出现在谓词菜单上。The minimize verb, which would normally be present on the verbs menu, is hidden because you disabled it in the declarative markup for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize/CS/allowminimizecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowMinimize/VB/allowminimizevb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 如果 控件可在两个区域之间移动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can move between zones; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为`true`, 并且网页处于允许进行布局更改的显示模式 (如编辑或设计模式) 时, 用户可以通过将控件移到页面上的另一个区域来更改页面布局。 When the property is `true`, and a Web page is in a display mode that allows layout changes (such as edit or design mode), a user can change the page layout by moving a control to another zone on the page. 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则无法在区域之间移动控件, 但仍可在其当前区域内移动。If the property is set to `false`, a control cannot be moved between zones, but can still be moved within its current zone. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为 , 并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改自定义 Web 部件控件的属性的默认设置, 以便最终用户无法将控件移到另一个区域。The following code example demonstrates how to change the default setting of the property for a custom Web Parts control, so that an end user cannot move the control to a different zone. 本示例假定使用自定义控件, `TextDisplayWebPart`该控件位于类概述的 "示例" 部分。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还使用自定义用户控件, 该控件使用户能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式。The code example also uses a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 通过在承载用户控件的网页顶部附近`Register`的指令引用用户控件。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在网页的声明性标记中, 在第二个``元素上`AllowZoneChange="false"`记下属性。In the declarative markup for the Web Page, on the second `` element, note the `AllowZoneChange="false"` attribute. 在运行时, 最终用户可以将第一个控件拖动到**WebPartZone2**中, 但不能使用第二个控件执行相同操作。At run time, an end user could drag the first control into **WebPartZone2**, but could not do the same with the second control. 在浏览器中加载页面并使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将显示模式更改为设计模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to design mode. 尝试将每个控件拖动到另一个区域中, 并根据其属性的值来记录不同的行为。Try to drag each of the controls into another zone, and note the different behavior based on the values of their properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/CS/allowzonechangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_AllowZoneChange/VB/allowzonechangevb.aspx#1)]

[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_CatalogIconImageUrl#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_CatalogIconImageURL/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_CatalogIconImageUrl#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_CatalogIconImageURL/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在网页的声明性标记中, 记下``元素。In the declarative markup of the Web page, note the `` element. 嵌套在它中是多个元素, ``包括元素。Nested within it are several elements, including an `` element. 这组元素使自定义控件出现在目录中。This set of elements enables the custom control to appear in a catalog. 请注意`` `CatalogIconImageUrl` , 在元素的标记中, 为属性分配一个字符串, 其中包含图像文件的 URL。In the markup for the `` element, notice that the `CatalogIconImageUrl` attribute is assigned a string that contains the URL to an image file. 在浏览器中加载页面, 并使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将显示模式更改为目录模式。Load the page in a browser and use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to change the display mode to catalog mode. 然后, 使用目录用户界面 (UI) 将自定义控件添加到页面。Then use the catalog user interface (UI) to add the custom control to the page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回属性的当前值, 或者, 如果控件没有标题, 则返回计算的值。 The property returns either the current value of the property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 计算得出的值包括无标题控件的可本地化资源字符串, 此外 (如果区域中有多个控件) 基于区域中控件的索引。The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls, plus (if there are multiple controls within the zone) a number based on the index of the control within the zone. 对于已重写属性以返回用作副标题的字符串值的自定义控件, 该属性与副标题连接以生成完整的标题。For custom controls where the property has been overridden to return a string value to use as a subtitle, the property is concatenated with the subtitle to produce a complete title. 属性值还作为工具提示的一部分, 当用户将鼠标指针置于控件的标题栏上方时, 将显示此工具提示。The property value also serves as part of a ToolTip that appears when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title bar of a control. 完整的工具提示包含值, 后跟连字符, 然后是控件属性的值。The full ToolTip consists of the value, followed by a hyphen, followed by the value of the control's property.

若要使导出代码示例正常运行, 还必须通过将特性`enableExport="true"`添加``到元素来更新 web.config 文件, 如 "备注" 部分所示。Note that for the export code example to work, you must also update your Web.config file by adding the attribute `enableExport="true"` to the `` element, as indicated in the Remarks section. 此示例的第一部分包含名为`TextDisplayWebPart`的控件的代码。The first part of this example contains the code for a control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件与类概述的 "示例" 部分中找到的自定义控件相同, 不同之处在于它`Personalizable`将特性添加到`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性中, 以便可以导出属性。This control is the same as the custom control that is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it adds a `Personalizable` attribute to the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property so the property can be exported. 请注意, 属性声明中包含`true` `isSensitive`参数的值, 这意味着将属性标记为敏感数据以供导出。Note that the attribute declaration includes a value of `true` for the `isSensitive` parameter, meaning that the property is marked as sensitive data for export purposes. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您将源代码编译成一个程序集, 将其放在您的 web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹中, 并在您`Register`的网页中使用指令引用该程序集。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/CS/exportmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_ExportMode/VB/exportmodevb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载网页, 并在控件的谓词菜单上, 单击 "导出" 谓词, 然后按照说明导出包含控件状态和属性数据的描述文件。Load the Web page in a browser, and on the verbs menu of the control, click the export verb and follow the instructions to export a description file containing the control's state and property data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet Explorer 呈现模式可能会影响控件的高度以及包含它的区域的高度。Internet Explorer rendering modes can affect the height of a control and the height of the zone that contains it. Internet Explorer 以兼容模式 (向后兼容之前的浏览器版本) 或在标准模式 (由页面中的`DOCTYPE`声明的存在) 显示网页。Internet Explorer renders Web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions) or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 有关这些模式的信息, 请参阅 DHTML [document.compatmode](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)属性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. 如果 Internet Explorer 在标准模式下呈现页面, 则在某些情况下, 它可能不会在表中调整单元格的大小, ``即使单元格的 HTML 标记为时也是如此。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, under some circumstances it might not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 因此, 将呈现控件及其包含区域, 以便控件不会延伸到区域的全部高度。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 当 Internet Explorer 处于 "标准" 模式下时, 在以下情况下, 控件不会呈现为高度拉伸:When Internet Explorer is in standard mode, controls do not render to stretch to their full height in the following cases: - 当区域的属性设置为 , 并且在区域上显式设置了高度时, 为。When a zone's property is set to and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 若要使控件能够填充区域的全部高度, 请不要指定水平方向区域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontally oriented zone. - 当区域的属性设置为 , 并且您没有显式设置区域或所包含控件的高度。When a zone's property is set to and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone or of the contained controls. 若要使控件能够填充区域的全部高度, 请设置区域的高度或垂直方向区域中控件的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertically oriented zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了影响 中的控件高度的呈现问题。The following code example demonstrates the rendering issue that affects the height of controls in a . 若要演示此问题, 必须在 Internet Explorer 中运行此页面。To demonstrate this issue, you must run the page in Internet Explorer. 请注意, 区域的方向设置为水平, 而区域的高度和其中的控件未显式设置。Note that the zone's orientation is set to horizontal, and that the height of the zone and the controls within it is not set explicitly. 结果是, 在中, 较短的控件在呈现时不会延伸到区域的高度。The result is that in the , the shorter control does not stretch to the height of the zone upon rendering. 但是, 如果从页中`DOCTYPE`删除声明并再次运行该页, 则不会发生此问题, 因为现在浏览器将不会在标准模式下呈现页。However, if you remove the `DOCTYPE` declaration from the page and run the page again, the issue does not occur, because now the browser will not render the page in standards mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Height#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Height/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Height#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Height/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 若要查看解决方法 (在 "备注" 部分中介绍) 的工作原理`height` , 请尝试``将属性添加到`DOCTYPE`元素, 同时在页面中保留声明。To see how the workaround (described in the Remarks section) works, try adding a `height` attribute to the `` element, while keeping the `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page. 你可以使用以下代码将该属性添加到标记:You can use the following code to add the attribute to the tag: `Height="200px"` 运行页, 现在这两个控件都将拉伸以填充区域的显式声明高度。Run the page, and now both controls stretch to fill the explicitly declared height of the zone. 你还可以尝试此代码示例, 以在另一种情况下 (当区域的设置为时, 将出现与高度相关的呈现问题。You can also experiment with this code example to observe the height-related rendering issue in the other scenario, which occurs when the zone's is set to . 从元素中`LayoutOrientation`删除现有属性及其值, 这将导致区域的方向恢复为默认垂直方向。 ``Remove the existing `LayoutOrientation` attribute and its value from the `` element, which will cause the zone's orientation to revert to the default vertical orientation. 如上文所述, 将``元素的高度特性设置为200像素, 并运行页。Set the height attribute on the `` element to 200 pixels, as you did above, and run the page. 区域的高度看起来太大, 控件不会按区域的高度调整大小。The zone's height looks too large, and the controls are not sized proportionately to the zone's height. 现在删除 height 属性, 然后再次运行页面。Now remove the height attribute and run the page again. 控件现在相对于区域的高度进行呈现。The controls now render relative to the height of the zone.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性可确定浏览器显示控件的帮助内容的方式。Use the property to determine how a browser will display Help content for a control. 下表列出了在显示控件的帮助内容时, 浏览器上各种帮助模式的影响。The following table lists the effects of the various Help modes on a browser when Help content for a control is displayed. |帮助模式Help mode|浏览器行为Browser behavior| |---------------|----------------------| ||打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability. 用户在返回到 Web 部件页之前必须关闭该窗口。A user must close the window before returning to the Web Parts page.| ||打开一个单独的浏览器窗口（如果浏览器具有此功能）。Opens a separate browser window, if the browser has this capability. 用户在返回到网页之前无需关闭该窗口。A user does not have to close the window before returning to the Web page.| ||替换浏览器窗口中的“Web 部件”页。Replaces the Web Parts page in the browser window.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为 , 并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在同一浏览器窗口中显示控件的帮助。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display Help for a control in the same browser window. 此示例的第一部分假定使用自定义控件, `TextDisplayWebPart`该控件位于类概述的 "示例" 部分。The first part of this example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例还包含一个 HTML 页面, 其中包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控件的虚拟帮助内容。The code example also includes an HTML page that contains fictitious Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 要使此示例正常运行, 必须将以下代码保存到名为 Textwebparthelp 的文件中, 并将其放置在站点的同一目录中。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 示例的最后一部分是显示如何引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控件的网页。The final part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 请注意, 在声明性标记中 , 属性值设置为, 代码还将属性的值设置为包含帮助内容的 HTML 文件的名称。Note that in the declarative markup, the property value is set to , and the code also sets the value of the property to the name of the HTML file that contains the Help content. 将页面加载到浏览器, 并单击控件的谓词菜单上的 "帮助" 谓词。Load the page into a browser, and click the help verb on the verbs menu of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐藏的控件将保留在其区域中, 实际上在其页面上呈现, 并且参与到`PreRender`页面生命周期阶段 (例如阶段), 即使它在浏览器中不可见。A control that is hidden remains in its zone, is actually rendered on its page, and participates in page life cycle phases such as the `PreRender` phase, even though it is not visible in a browser. 这与关闭的控件不同, 因为关闭的控件甚至不呈现在页上, 而隐藏控件在 Web 部件的应用程序中呈现和活动, 但不能对用户可见。This is different from controls that are closed, because closed controls are not even rendered on a page, while hidden controls are rendered and active in Web Parts applications, though not visible to users. Web 部件控件集通过将控件的级联样式表 (CSS) 样式设置为的`display:none`值来隐藏控件。The Web Parts control set hides the control by setting its cascading style sheet (CSS) style to a value of `display:none`. 即使将控件的属性设置为`true`, 如果页上的当前显示模式允许显示隐藏控件, 仍然会显示该控件。Even if the property for a control is set to `true`, the control is still displayed if the current display mode on the page allows hidden controls to be displayed. 例如, 编辑模式允许显示隐藏控件, 以便用户可以对其进行编辑。For example, edit mode allows hidden controls to be displayed, so that users can edit them. 当隐藏控件在某些显示模式中可见时, 控件的标题将显示一个字符串, 指示控件处于隐藏状态。When hidden controls are visible in certain display modes, the title of the control displays a string indicating that the control is in hidden status. 当 控件上的属性设置为`false`(默认值) 时, 控件将显示在该页上。When the property on a control is set to `false`, which is the default, the control is displayed on the page. 请注意, 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则不允许最终用户编辑属性值。Note that if the property is set to `false`, end users are not allowed to edit the property value. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用自定义 Web 部件控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property for a custom Web Parts control. 本示例假定使用自定义控件, `TextDisplayWebPart`该控件位于类概述的 "示例" 部分。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is found in the Example section of the class overview. 请注意, 在网页的``元素声明性标记中`Hidden` , 属性值设置为`true`。Notice that in the Web page, in the declarative markup for the `` element, the `Hidden` attribute value is set to `true`. 如果`TextDisplayWebPart`页面加载到浏览器中, 则不会显示该控件。The `TextDisplayWebPart` control will not appear if the page is loaded in a browser. 但是, 该控件仍然存在于页面上和其区域中, 如果你创建了这些连接, 它仍可以与其他控件参与连接。However, the control is still present on the page and in its zone, and it still could participate in connections with other controls if you created those connections. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Hidden#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Hidden/CS/hiddencs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Hidden#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Hidden/VB/hiddenvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许设置自定义错误消息, 当用户尝试将部件控件的说明文件导入到 Web 部件控件的目录中时, 会显示错误消息。The property allows you to set a custom error message that is displayed if an error occurs when a user tries to import a part control's description file into a catalog of Web Parts controls. 可以在控件上以声明方式设置属性, 在控件`ImportErrorMessage`的开始标记中添加特性, 并为其分配错误消息字符串。You can set the property declaratively on a control, adding the `ImportErrorMessage` attribute within the opening tag of the control and assigning an error message string to it. 还可以通过编程方式设置属性值。You can also set the property value programmatically. 完整的代码示例演示了导出和导入。控件的 WebPart 说明文件, 其中包括属性的使用, 请参阅类。For a full code example that demonstrates both exporting and importing .WebPart description files for controls, which includes use of the property, see the class. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 此属性的个性化设置范围设置为 , 并且只能由授权用户修改。The personalization scope of this property is set to and can be modified only by authorized users. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享 Web 部件控件对网页的所有用户均可见。A shared Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web page. 与共享控件相反, 共享控件是特定于用户的控件, 仅对向页面添加该控件的用户可见。The opposite of a shared control is a per-user control, which is user-specific and is visible only to the user who added that control to a page. 如果某个动态控件是用户在共享个性化设置范围内查看该页时添加的, 则该控件将是共享的。If a dynamic control is added while a user is viewing the page in shared personalization scope, the control will be shared. 如果在用户处于用户个性化设置范围内时添加了控件, 则该控件的属性值将为`false`。If the control is added while the user is in user personalization scope, the property value for that control will be `false`. 有关共享控件和每用户控件的详细信息, 请参阅[Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information about shared and per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用自定义 Web 部件控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property for a custom Web Parts control. 本示例假定使用在`TextDisplayWebPart` 类概述的 "示例" 部分中创建的自定义控件。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 当你在浏览器中加载网页并单击 "**检查共享**" 按钮时, 该代码将检查`TextDisplayWebPart`控件上的属性, 并且属性的值为`true`, 因为控件在中被引用为静态控件页的声明性标记。When you load the Web page in a browser and click the **Check Sharing** button, the code checks the property on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and the value of the property is `true`, because the control is referenced as a static control in the declarative markup of the page. summary.span: 设置一个标志，以指示当前 控件实例的个性化数据已更改。

span.span: Sets a flag indicating that personalization data has changed for the current control instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置一个标志, 该标志指示控件状态数据已在控件上更改 (个性化), 因此该控件需要将个性化设置数据保存到长期存储。 The method sets a flag indicating that control state data has been changed (personalized) on a control, and that the control therefore needs to persist the personalization data to long term storage. 通常, 会在控件上保持个性化更改, 而不需要开发人员调用方法。Normally the persists personalization changes on controls without a need for developers to call the method. 但在两种情况下, 开发人员需要调用此方法。But there are two cases in which developers do need to call this method. 第一种情况是在向页面发出 HTTP `GET`请求期间, 控件状态数据发生更改。The first case is when control state data is changed during an HTTP `GET` request to a page. 默认情况下, 在`GET`请求过程中对控件状态数据所做的更改不会保留 (出于安全考虑)。By default, changes to control state data during a `GET` request are not persisted (for security purposes). 但在这种情况下, 方法提供了一种将合法的个性化更改持久保存到控件的方法。But the method provides a way to persist legitimate personalization changes to controls in this case. 调用方法的第二种情况在向页面发出`POST` HTTP 请求的过程中发生。The second case for calling the method occurs during an HTTP `POST` request to a page. 如果控件具有复杂的可个性化属性 (例如, 包含对象的属性), 并且这些`POST`属性中的控件状态数据在请求过程中是个性化的, 则开发人员必须调用 用于确保更改持久保存的方法。If a control has complex personalizable properties (such as a property that contains an object), and control state data in those properties is personalized during a `POST` request, developers must call the method to ensure that the changes are persisted.

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性, 可选择返回自定义控件中将追加到控件标题的标准副标题字符串。 Use the property optionally to return a standard subtitle string in your custom control that will be appended to the control's title. 如果为自定义 控件中的属性提供值, 则 Web 部件控件集会自动将其追加到属性的值, 以创建控件的完整标题。If you provide a value for the property in a custom control, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the property to create a complete title for the control. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为自定义控件的实例提供副标题。The following code example demonstrates how to provide a subtitle for instances of a custom control. 此示例的第一部分包含名为`TextDisplayWebPart`的自定义控件的代码。The first part of this example contains the code for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此控件与在类概述的 "示例" 部分中找到的自定义控件相同, 不同之处在于它还会重写属性, 以便为实例提供包含虚构公司名称的标准副标题自定义控件。This control is the same as the custom control which is found in the Example section of the class overview, except that it also overrides the property to provide a standard subtitle containing a fictitious company name for instances of the custom control. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定您将源代码编译成一个程序集, 将其放在您的 web 应用程序的 Bin 子文件夹中, 并在您`Register`的网页中使用指令引用该程序集。This code example assumes that you compile the source code into an assembly, place it in a Bin subfolder of your Web application, and reference the assembly with a `Register` directive in your Web page. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分是网页, 其中演示了如何在 ASP.NET 网页`TextDisplayWebPart`中引用该控件。The second part of the example is a Web page that shows how to reference the `TextDisplayWebPart` control in an ASP.NET Web page. 在浏览器中加载页面后, 控件的标题栏文本包含分配给声明性标记中的控件的标题、连字符分隔符和`TextDisplayWebPart`控件中自定义副标题的值。After you load the page in a browser, the control's title bar text includes the title assigned to the control in the declarative markup, a hyphen separator, and the value of the custom subtitle from the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/CS/subtitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Subtitle/VB/subtitlevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果开发人员为属性分配一个值, 则该值将确定控件标题栏中的文本 (或至少部分)。If a developer assigns a value to the property, then that value determines all (or at least part of) the text in the control's title bar. 将鼠标指针置于控件或区域中显示的其他服务器控件的标题栏上方时, 标题文本也会显示为工具提示文本的一部分。The title text also appears as part of the ToolTip text when you position your mouse pointer over the title bar of a control or other server control that appears in a zone. 控件的标题栏中显示的完整文本也受属性的影响。The complete text displayed in a control's title bar is also affected by the property. 如果该属性的值为赋值, 则将该值连接到标题。If that property has a value assigned to it, the value is concatenated to the title. 如果没有为属性赋值, 则显示计算出的标题。If no value is assigned to the property, a calculated title is displayed. 在任何时候, 开发人员都可以通过获取 属性的值来检索控件的标题栏中显示的实际文本总计。At any point, developers can retrieve the actual, total text displayed in a control's title bar by getting the value of the property. 标题文本的样式由包含部件控件的区域的属性确定。The style of the title text is determined by the property of the zone that contains the part control. 有关演示如何使用基属性的代码示例, 请参见属性。For a code example that demonstrates the use of the base property, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 谓词从类派生, 并提供用户可对控件执行的用户界面 (UI) 操作。Verbs derive from the class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a control. 通常, 谓词在用户界面中表示为按钮、链接或菜单项。Usually verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items. 默认情况下, 常用 Web 部件谓词出现在每个控件的标题栏中的下拉谓词菜单上。By default, common Web Parts verbs appear on a drop-down verbs menu in each control's title bar. 有一些标准谓词可用于打开、关闭、编辑和最小化控件, 以及用于导出控件定义或加载帮助文件的其他谓词。There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file. 这些谓词不包含在集合中, 因为集合只包含您通过在派生类中重写此属性而创建和返回的自定义谓词。These verbs are not included in the collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs that you create and return by overriding this property in a derived class. 当你创建自定义谓词并将其添加到集合时, 你可以从控件以编程方式访问谓词。When you create custom verbs and add them to the collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问自定义 Web 部件控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property for a custom Web Parts control. 本示例假定使用在`TextDisplayWebPart` 类概述的 "示例" 部分中创建的自定义控件。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 请注意, 若要使代码示例正常运行, 必须在 web.config 文件中添加一个设置, 以便导出 Web 部件说明文件。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保在此代码示例的网页所在的同一目录中有一个 web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 在部分中, 请确保有一个``元素的`enableExport`属性设置为`true`, 如以下标记所示。 ``Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 单击 "**显示谓词计数**" 按钮时, 它会访问属性以获取`TextDisplayWebPart`控件的自定义谓词的计数, 并显示标签中的计数。When you click the **Display Verb Count** button, it accesses the property to get the count of custom verbs for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and displays the count in a label. 因为在这种情况下, 没有为控件添加自定义谓词, 所以计数为零。Because no custom verbs have been added to the control in this case, the count is zero. remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件页始终具有控件的单个实例。A Web Parts page always has a single instance of a control. 控件跟踪和管理页上的所有其他 Web 部件控件, 包括从基类派生的所有区域, 以及派生自基类的所有部件控件。 The control tracks and manages all the other Web Parts controls on a page, including all zones that derive from the base class, and all part controls that derive from the base class. 属性存在, 以便每个控件都可以与其控件关联。 The property exists so that every control can be associated with its control. 然后, 控件在其集合中维护页面上所有控件的集合。 The control, in turn, maintains a collection of all the controls on a page in its collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集的体系结构中, 只有当控件在区域内操作时, 控件才能具有 Web 部件功能。In the architecture of the Web Parts control set, controls can have Web Parts functionality only if they operate inside of zones. 要在网页上使用的标准区域是控件。The standard zone to use on Web pages is the control. 虽然最终用户可以在网页上的不同区域之间移动 Web 部件控件, 但一个控件的给定实例一次只能驻留在一个区域中。Although end users can move Web Parts controls between different zones on a Web page, a given instance of a control can reside in only one zone at a time. Web 部件控件及其关联的控件, 使用属性跟踪控件当前驻留在哪个区域, 以及区域的常见布局和样式特征应用于所有包含的 Web 部件控件。A Web Parts control, and its associated control, use the property to keep track of which zone the control currently resides in, and what common layout and style characteristics of the zone apply to all contained Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问自定义 Web 部件控件的和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the and properties for a custom Web Parts control. 本示例假定使用在`TextDisplayWebPart` 类概述的 "示例" 部分中创建的自定义控件。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含一个自定义用户控件, 该控件使用户能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式。The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 通过在承载用户控件的网页顶部附近`Register`的指令引用用户控件。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面上有``两个元素, 每个元素表示一个 Web 部件区域。There are two `` elements on the page, each representing a Web Parts zone. 第一个区域包含一个标准控件, 该控件在运行时的作用像是一个控件, 因为它位于区域中。The first zone contains a standard control, which acts like a control at run time because it is in a zone. 第二个区域包含`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The second zone contains the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 当用户单击 "**区域信息**" 按钮时, `Label1`控件将显示该控件的 属性的值, 以及当前包含控件的区域的属性。When a user clicks the **Zone Information** button, the `Label1` control displays the values of the property for the control, and the property of the zone that currently contains the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/CS/webpartzoneindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPart_Zone#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPart_Zone/VB/webpartzoneindexvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 控件在其区域中的数字顺序。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示 Web 部件控件在其区域中相对于该区域中其他控件的数值顺序 (或序号位置)。The property indicates a Web Parts control's numerical order (or ordinal position) within its zone, relative to other controls in the zone. 控件使用此属性在网页上跟踪和管理其 Web 部件控件的集合。The control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不能假定控件的属性的值将等于控件区域的集合中同一控件的索引值。You cannot assume that the value of the property for a control will equal the index value for the same control within the collection of the control's zone. 通常, 在区域中添加和移除控件时, 控件在其区域中的相对位置 (其值) 和其在其区域的集合中的索引将是不同的值。Often a control's relative position in its zone (its value), and its index within the collection of its zone, will be different values as controls are added to and removed from zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问自定义 Web 部件控件的和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the and properties for a custom Web Parts control. 本示例假定使用在`TextDisplayWebPart` 类概述的 "示例" 部分中创建的自定义控件。This example assumes the use of a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, created in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含一个自定义用户控件, 该控件使用户能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式。The code example includes a custom user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 通过在承载用户控件的网页顶部附近`Register`的指令引用用户控件。The user control is referenced by means of a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page that hosts the user control. 有关如何创建此用户控件和使用显示模式的详细说明, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a detailed description of how to create this user control and work with display modes, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
